toMap

public static final java.util.Map toMap(java.sql.ResultSet rs,
                                        java.util.List wantedColumnNames)
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
Funció extreta de: http://forum.java.sun.com/thread.jspa?threadID=484092&messageID=2262423 autor: duffymo Helper method that maps a ResultSet into a map of column lists

Parameters:
rs - ResultSet
wantedColumnNames - of columns names to include in the result map
Returns:
map of lists, one per column, with column name as the key
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - if the connection fails
